parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3 </value></part><part><name/>=<value> Game

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56</value></part><part><name>Game Version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Menu </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a string containing shortcut text for menu item on the given path. <template><title>Warning</title><part><name index="1"/><value>This command is currently broken in Arma 3 2.00. It only returns shortcuts which do not use a modifier key (CTRL, ALT and SHIFT).</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[menuShortcutText]] [idc, path] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control [[menuShortcutText]] path </value></part><part><name>Alternative Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>Alternative Parameter 1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>Alternative Parameter 2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value>  [[String]] </value></part><part><name>Alternative Return Value</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value>  <Code>[[findDisplay]] 313 [[displayCtrl]] 120 [[menuShortcutText]] [1, 8];<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Returns "#"</value></part></template></code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[menuShortcut]] [[menuSetShortcut]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
